She is adamant that counseling is her life’s purpose. She does not enter a “job” each day, but she comes to serve her ministry. Of the 16 years she has worked as a counselor, she has always been embraced by former students who often thank her for the role she played in their lives.

Congratulations Dr. Cook!!
